ask_birth_date.prompt: Hello {userName}! ‚ú® Welcome to your Personal Cosmic Coach. To get started, please tell me your birth date in DD/MM/YYYY format (e.g., 01/01/2000).
ask_birth_date.error_message: Oops! That doesn't look like a valid date. Please use DD/MM/YYYY format (e.g., 01/01/2000).

ask_birth_time.prompt: Great! Now, please tell me your birth time in HH:MM format (e.g., 14:30). If you don't know, you can type 'unknown'.
ask_birth_time.error_message: Invalid time format. Please use HH:MM (e.g., 14:30) or type 'unknown'.

ask_birth_place.prompt: Almost there! Finally, please tell me your birth place (City, Country), e.g., Mumbai, India.
ask_birth_place.error_message: Please provide your birth place (City, Country).

complete_onboarding.prompt: Thank you! Your profile is now complete. You can now ask me for your horoscope, birth chart analysis, or compatibility readings. What would you like to explore?

Reply with the sign name (e.g., 'Aries').

ask_partner_birth_date.error_message: Oops! That doesn't look like a valid date. Please use DD/MM/YYYY format (e.g., 01/01/2000).

ask_partner_birth_time.prompt: Great! Now, please tell me your partner's birth time in HH:MM format (e.g., 14:30). If you don't know, you can type 'unknown'.

ask_partner_birth_place.prompt: Almost there! Finally, please tell me your partner's birth place (City, Country), e.g., Mumbai, India.

confirm_subscription.error_message: Please reply 'yes' to confirm or 'no' to cancel.
